&y                          RELIGION COMMANDS&n
&n
&gPara usar os poderes dos deuses, execute os seguintes comandos:&n
&n
&WDeuses       &cComandos&n
&CM&cuir       &w: &cHonor&n
&YI&ylma&wna&yteu&Yr &w: &cHumility&n
&CS&ce&Cl&cu&Cn&ce     &w: &cFreedom&n
&YH&Welm       &w: &cLaw&n
&YOhgma      &w: &cIdentify &w(&gObj&w|&yMob&w|&cPlayer&w)&n
&WT&wempus     &w: &cWarrior&n
&WB&wa&Wn&we       &w: &cOppression&n
&MPa&mndo&Mra    &w: &cSeduction&n
&RT&ra&wl&ro&Rs      &w: &cDestruction&n
&n
&n
&WVEJA TAMBEM: &Yreligions&w, &Yalinhamento.&n
